Treatments GSK189075 500mg daily three day plus moxifloxacin placebo Day 3 ; GSK189075 4000mg daily three day plus moxifloxacin placebo Day 3 ; placebo tablet daily three day plus moxifloxacin placebo Day 3 ; placebo tablet daily three day plus Moxifloxacin 400mg Day 3 . Volunteers blindfold dose . Each volunteer participate four treatment period receive dose combination study end . Volunteers wear Holter monitor ( device record heart rate rhythm continuously ) day 1 3 . Study drug level assess multiple blood draw , occur day 3 .
